scripts.dev: npx nodemon --exec 'npm start' --watch dal --watch routes --watch views --watch app.js
scripts.watch:doc-src: npx nodemon --exec 'npm run build:docs' --watch dal --watch routes --watch views --watch app.js
scripts.watch:docs: npm run watch:doc-output & npm run watch:doc-src
scripts.docs:dev: npm run build:docs && npm run watch:docs & npm run serve:docs
